values:
, thank you.

  ...

le sigh. Its been good kids, but I shall put you to rest, and begin the next chaper of my life. I will probably update occassionally on this journal though, so keep me on your friends lists, I want to be able to read everyones thoughts and inspirations. Indeed. Fairwell, My darlings.

You slept with Josh last night!
For God Sakes woman, why would I do that in your own house?!
You called New York!
You and dad are getting old, and need to start writing yourself remember this post-its.

Oi, to sum it up in a jewish manner.

Its 7:44, apparently I missed church due to anger/sleep needs.
I get home from rivergate and dropping Josh off when mom follows me into my room while im on the effin toilet seat, and goes on about the phone bill. Im sorry about the Lebanon calls, if you guys would just get the package where its only like 10 dollars a month for unlimited long distance, I wouldnt have gone over, My fault. I mean Im sorry about that, but then to make matters worse she pratically accuses me for making a phone call to New York. Camden? Camly? Connelly? I just remember a C. When in all reality as at lack of a real mind as my mother is, she probably called there and forgot, or my dad did it and just wants me to catch the slack for it. Same with when things go missing. Katie have you seen, Katie did you move, Katie wheres my...blah blah blah. Find it your own damn self woman, you moved it. She can be so sweet sometimes, but man when she's on a rampage. Look Out. Dad was probably smirking as he sat listening. THEN THEN she accuses me of sleeping with Josh last night. ( he stayed because his mom pretty much kicked him out and he didnt have anywhere to stay) anyway, when he CLEARLY slept on the couch and I CLEARLY slept all ALONE in my bed... Erg. I sneeze up blood, you think I want anyone sleeping with me? For 2. Also, I learned my lesson back when I was 16. I have no desire to piss my parents off further with a boy in my bed house. Oi. But that doesnt really matter to them. For all they notice, Im some heathen child with no respect for anything or anyone, going where i please, doing what I please without ever telling them, then they come on here and read about my life, but never acctually effin bother to ask me, and if they do they wouldnt freakin believe me. Apparently im satan, reincarnate.

Two Interview's so far, amazing when you're not really looking, they all get thrown at you. Pac Sun called yesturday, Then I have another one at walmart at 2 Tuesday. Yay, now I can hopefully get myself out of here. At first I thought about it and wanted to stay until I got done with my second year of dental, but right now, I'm mentally packing my bags till I have money enough to get out. But Im not going to even talk about that right now.

I wanted to go to church tonight. I woke up at 7:44. Dah. Church doesnt even belong in this entry. Im too mad right now.
I really need a new layout. Ick. Im tired of my guns. Le sigh.

Hey, I can dream Cant  I?
I would love that kit. It's starting to lean me over to it rather than Wings West. But I like both so It doesnt really matter. I just really love the front of the Blitz kit. Ha the name sounds so ghetto. Yeah, but it would look so much more lovely if it was a hot screaming obnoxious barbie/bubble gum pink. Oh yes.

pretty girl is suffering while he confesses everything.
pretty soon she'll figure out what his intentions were about.
and that's what you get for falling again;
you can never get him out of your head.
and that's what you get for falling again;
you can never get him out of your head.

it's the way that he makes you feel.
it's the way that he kisses you.
it's the way that he makes you fall in love.

she's beautiful as usual with bruises on her ego and
the killer instinct tells her to be aware of evil men.
and that's what you get for falling again;
you can never get him out of your head.
and that's what you get for falling again;
you can never get him out of your head.

it's the way that he makes you feel.
it's the way that he kisses you.
it's the way that he makes you fall in love. 

pretty girl... pretty girl...

pretty girl is suffering while he confesses everything.
pretty soon she'll figure out: you can never get him out of your head.

it's the way that he makes you cry.
it's the way that he's in your mind.
it's the way that he makes you fall in love.
it's the way that he makes you feel.
it's the way that he kisses you.
it's the way that he makes you fall in love

Dah, Spring Break is next week?! I didnt know that, curse.

When you are out of school you are out of 'THE LOOP'.
Anyway. I need 8 people or more this summer who are interested in a road trip to Destin Florida, My uncle has a condo and I asked him about prices and as long as we go sometime other than spring break its not bad at all maybe 100 a person. So if anyone wants to go down there and make some fun stops on the way and spend a nice week on the beach, then let me know.

I feel gross this morning, I cant breathe. I really wanna go to church tonight but Im not gonna go if I have to blow my nose every 6 seconds. That is gross. Im even sneezing BLOOD.
Ha okay. Im sure everyone is happy now.

Um, josh update.
Told me he went out with Tim from the Discount Tobbacco outlet, and Mario the security guy, come to find out he went out with Chrystal the athiest whore metal head. Yeah, my total opposite, but maybe thats what he's going for.
Im just keeping my head up and waiting for my PRINCE CHARMING. Yay, im excited. Im like a kid waiting to recieve a gift in the mail, because I know it's just for me and already been sent all I have to do is wait and recieve it. :O) yay again.
Speaking of packages, I am expecting Grandma's old jewelry soon. Yippe. No she's not dead, she's in the loony bin so I get her neat jewelry. Woop.

Second note.
The  Passion is out today. I really want to go see it tonight but the way I understand it is that its sold out for the next two weeks. Bleh. Well we'll see.

So pardon me while I burst into flames
I've had enough of the world
and its people's mindless games
so pardon me while I burn
and rise above the flame
pardon me, pardon me
I'll never be the same

A woman in a hot air balloon realized she was lost. She lowered altitude and spotted a man in a boat below. She shouted       to him, "Excuse me, can you help me? I promised a friend I would meet him an hour ago, but I don't know where I am."

 The man consulted his portable GPS and replied, "You're in a hot air balloon approximately 30 feet above a ground elevation of 2346 feet above sea level. You are 31 degrees, 14.97 minutes north latitude and 100 degrees, 49..09 minutes west longitude.

 She rolled her eyes and said, "You must be a Republican."

 

"I am," replied the man. "How did you know?"

 

"Well," answered the balloonist, "everything you told me is technically correct, but I have no idea what to make of       your information, and I'm still lost.. Frankly, you've not been much help to me."

 

The man smiled and responded, "You must be a Democrat."

 

"I am," replied the balloonist. "How did you know?"

 

"Well," said the man, "you don't know where you are or where you're going. You've risen to where you are due to a large       quantity of hot air. You made a promise that you have no idea how to keep, and you expect ME to solve your problem. You're in EXACTLY the same position you were in before we met, but somehow now, it's MY fault.

Sick as a dog.

Had fun last night, hung out with abe and michael. Played Pool. Um, got sick last night and went home early this morning because I was near dead, slept the majority of the day, took alot of pills.
My dad is an ass...
Yeah your normal wonderful day.

He gets MAD at me because I finally got an interview, supposedly someone from his church said something to the hiring manager. Thats fine and dadny, but what the hell, yeah yell at me for it. He is effin retarded. Yeah way to be happy for me dad, im finally gonna be out of your hair and your mad at me. Shows how much you effin care. Then mom and him both get on to me for renting "Rules of Attraction" and a movie called "Thirteen" which is an independant film about a mother and her daughter going through her teenage years. Its a story about true life and the human spirit. Sure it has cuss words in it, but not like dad doesnt own movies like that. Hypocrites. Mom reads those dirty books, like white oleander was 80% sex and drug related crap, but yet if I watch them say the cuss words, its different than reading it. Yeah not like im 18 and can make decisions on my own. For once I wish they'd freakin realize this. Here I am sick as crap and they yell at me. Screw you guys. Gr.

Ha abe is mad at josh because of josh being a butt, woo. He said he'd get stuff out of him for me. I love abe, he is really cool. I got the wrong impression from what everone was saying about him but turns out he's pretty awesome. 
I also think its cool that friday night when i hung out with kendalyn and she told me about Andrews and her's relationship that I prayed that night God would show me if I was supposed to be with josh, then sure enough Saturday roles around and he breaks up with me. Im not really upset anymore, and wasnt really to begin with. Just hurt kinda. Then I get a job interview at walmart and thats perfect so that way I can have something to get my mind off of him. Now Im just waiting patiently for Mr. Right, because I believe God will come through for me. I've come to realize all i really have to do is ask sincerely and God comes through. Thats really cool. I wish God would make my parents stop being so stiff. I still get treated like I supposedly dont know left from right.

Sigh.
All alone again today, Josh hasnt called, but I dont expect him to, I dont blame her for being mad at me. For once Its my fault so Im just gonna take it like a man and sit around and feel sorry for myself. Bah.

There is a man over fixing my bathtub. Yeeeah.

I need to do something, and stop sitting around like a pathetic loser, but im kinda lost all by myself. I was going to wash the car but im waiting for these guys to leave so I dont have to leave them alone in my room. Mom is gone to physical therapy so Im alone with him and craig the house guy. They just went out the door but i dunno if they are gone for sure or not. One thing for sure is that i really need to pee, but my bathroom is occupied. Dah.

Off to go burn Cd's of pathetic hopeless songs.
I feel so 'Emo' right now-haha.

I had someone ask me what a Degu looked like

 

Then the cute little babies ( not mine but a picture i found )

Well im off to go back to napping I suppose. Im somewhat depressed today. I probably will be tomorrow also.

yea

This Entry is specifically for Whitlee and Savanah

TAKE A GERBIL!!! I know you dont have them and you NEEED THEM
These 3 need homes, be kind. Malorie, take MORE. My degus turns out arent boy/boy, so more space is needed. If anyone wants to claim a Degu that'd be great too. Online they sell for 30 bucks, but you can have one free. Dah, im being over run by RODENTS. At least it doesnt smell.

Buster

Ceasar

And...

My little bear lovie.

Please, TAKE THEM AWAY.

Yepp. Its 12:30 and I just got up about 10 minutes ago. I never can seem to get up early. I have no motivation and Ive gotten really lazy from not having a job at 9 to go to.Dah. Im thinking about putting in some applications in down in lebanon, Ive tried to get a job here in Gallatin but to no avail. I wish Goody's would call but looks as if that isnt going to happen. Eh, oh well.

I was planning on washing my car today but the weather seems to be a bitt chilly for me to get wet outside. Plus I think it's just going to rain anyway, so why bother. Perhaps tomorrow. Tomorrow Hopefully will be great, Kristy and I want to go to a club in downtown nashville. We havnt decided which one yet, but I still hope she wants to go. I need to dip into the savings to get some money. Im glad I'll have enough to pay for all this court crap, plus with the money Im getting on my tax return, that should cover it. If I get away without any other fines Im gonna buy a system. For factory my cars speakers are great but im looking for more... "Umph". Teehee. Well Im off to find something constructive to do with my time.

I take a look around
it's evident the scene has changed
and there are times when I feel improved
improved upon the past
and there are times when I
can't seem to understand at all
and yes it seems as though I'm going
nowhere really fucking fast

I remember I used to use that line when I was in middle school. ha.

Great day today. Josh came over with Mattie (My Dog) and we went to Mansker Creek Park and walked around the track and had a picnic. When you get tward the end there is a huge family of like 20 squirrels that all come up to you for food, its so freakin awesome. I love squirrels.
I sounded really weird just then.
I came home around 6 or so and cleaned out the gerbil room. Read a Letter Derek sent me from boot camp, got bored cleaned some more, got dad's camera and had a photo shoot, just simply because I could and I havnt done that since I was little and vain. Well I was never vain, but extremely concerned with how I looked. That was back in middle school though, so no worries. Hehe. Um, Posted on some communities because I could. Looked through Hot_Fashion and yeah here I sit eating some great jalapeno cheese dip from los compadres. I believe I'll go to bed on time tonight too. Im doing good.
Oh, and I dyed my hair finally like 2 days ago, for those of you who were agrivated with my yapping about it.

Live Journal is Effing gay, die live journal, die.
Someone please recomend a good web hosting site before i bust a cap in my computers non exsistant arse.

You know, I hate Live Journal in Rich Text mode. It can freakin die. It always ends up erasing my entry one way or another, but only after I've written the whole thing. Grr, curse you livejournal of DOOOOM.

Its 55 degrees outside, I am deffinatly going to go wash my poor wittle car today. Which works now, thanks to a new battery.

Ha, and lets all thank David for finding this classic on ebay for me.

Staring "Dildo Baggins"

Ha

Hand over my mouth
I'm earning the right to my silence
in quiet discerning between ego and timing
good judgment is once again proving to me
that it's still worth its weight in gold
from now on I'm gonna be so much more weary
when you start to speak and my warm blood starts to boil
seeing you is like pulling teeth
and hearing your voice is like chewing tin foil

Im at Kristy's! Yay.

We went and talked to the Lawyer yesturday and he was awesome, he told us that quote unquote "You're white, you're free, and you can do whatever the hell you want to" Hehe, he was awesome. I expected an younger man, but he was bald and had little bits of white hair on the side and a funny mustache. It was just great. He told us that this was a "Mickey Mouse" case and that its nothing to worry about. I will probably just end up with court costs (about 150 bucks) and pre trial diversion, which means that after a year my record will be "esponged" hehe.. meaning completely whiped free except for like an "FBI" number or something. Wonderful. He even told me if i ever needed a Lawyer the most he would charge me would be 750 bucks. Wooha. Which isnt bad considering most of the time those kind of things are thousands of dollars. Im also glad he told me I could hang out with Kristy again. I get lonely otherwise because everyone else is in school and im all alone. But now Im not, so yay.

Yesturday after the Lawyer we went to the sherrif's dpt. to get my application for a public defender, which i will go turn in tomorrow. Then we went back to her house where we found that Julie Kate ( a girl that used to like josh and he almost cheated on me with) Had been calling Josh and steven, and also they emailed them both this horridly whorish picture of her and another girl making out. Yes, she deffinatly is still on drugs. Anywho. Apparently the other night the guys had met up with them and told us all they did was drive around all night, which was hard to believe in the first place, but then the dumbasses just omit that they ever met up with Julie and this chick Krystal, and when we confronted them they lied.
Why do men feel the need to lie even if they'd get in less trouble if they just told the truth? I mean we didnt really care if they did stuff with the whores, but lying about it is a different matter. Im pretty mad, but I really dont care right now. I feel im at a point in my life where stupid guy stuff isnt quite as important as it once was. Plus there is a certain someone, maybe out of my league, but just the thought that they are there gives me an odd sort of hope that everything will be fine if another josh thing happens again. Thats a different story though. 

My car didnt start today, really couldnt tell you why. We tried to jump it off but the battery was so dead it wouldnt even make a noise or try to start. So I got the jeep today, yay. I still feel sorry for my poor babylove. Poor neon. Eh, its just a battery. Went to the DTO to talk to tim, then came back here while im waiting for Kristy to finish practicing piano. Im tempted to get up this instant and start cleaning her room... Eek. Hehe, i love you :O)

Well kiddie-o's im off to play with the gerbies.
goodbye my loves.

I WILL dye my hair tonight, dangit.
I think ive been saying that for a week now. Maybe longer.

Tomorrow's agenda.
Lawyer at 2:30
Talking to Stacy and Patrick about all this crappy youth drama.
After that, no clue. Maybe something with Kristy if the Lawyer says its okay.

Yeaaah. I had an okay day today, I am a bit tired because I had to get up early, but I napped so Im alright. Josh randomly showed up at my house this morning so I went out with him. We went four wheeling and to a park, then to the mall and talked to Galen about his neato Jeep that was on TRUCKS! If you've ever seen that show on Spike tv. It was really awesome. Yeah, so Josh has a new mudding buddy now. How cute.

Im wanting to do something new to my hair, but Court is next month and I'd like to look elegent, instead of weird. Ive heard the judge is biast to weird people. Yeah, well im off to go bite josh for messing up his truck which he just got fixed. dumb men.

I dont have any money and I have plenty of problems.

Its like 8 something, I usually wouldnt even dare get up this early unless I'd have gone to bed like a normal person last night. I was so flustered I ended up talking to Kristy till about 1:30 or so. I also got to talk to Chris, who I havnt talked to in a while. So anyway.

I am really hoping today will be alot better. I woke up this morning to a wet sopping nasty gerbil cage because Hunny the spaz, is as before mentioned, a spaz, and chewed holes in the side of it causing all the water to leak into the cage. Gerbils can be such dumb creatures, but come to think of it, she is the only one that does that. I should just give her a big mental kick. I hope her babie's dont turn out that stupid, all like 6 billion of them... Dah. So I have to clean out stinky gerbil cage at 8 in the morning. Oh how life loves me. Indeed. I can only say that when a bad day is headed tward you, it usually starts in the morning, except on the occasions when it wants to catch you off gaurd and beat you in the face like a mo' fo. Yeah, please dont be a bad day. I think I am just going to come home after the doctor and sleep. You really cant get into any trouble sleeping. Im tired anyway and need to catch up on my "zz's" shall we call them.

Well children, Im off to take mummy to the doctor to get her stitches out. I've come to realize I cant go a period of two weeks without having to go to some kind of doctor, whether it be mine or someone else's.
Good Day my loves. Everyone enjoy your day off!
CANKERWORM: see thats what u get for being baptist

Marriage is love.
Its odd that im conservitive but share some liberal views. Well im sure everyone is like that.

okay, good day, bad night.
The day started out wonderfully, I got to spend some time with my loverly Malorie, we went to Sally's and got purple hair dye, then Walmart, then Target. I love Target. Anyway. We came back with some lovely Boxers for Justin's Vday gift and hair dye. ooh La la.
We went back to malories and dyed it, it came out very lovely except the purple completely washed out. I knew that brand sucked but the woman at the counter said it was okay in the darker colors... Im slightly perterbed. I will deffinatly not let anyone buy that crap again. I knew Manic Panic was better... I feel slumpy. Yeah anywho.

Missed The little Drama thing at church, but thats okay. Went and got there late cause I had to get gas, but that was okay too. The service was good and I enjoyed it, we're having like a mission theme or something. Church lets out, and here we go, as always to los compadres. I really do not like going there every freakin sunday and wednesday but I ride along non the less because I wanted to go goof off. 
We get there and honestly I dont know where to start or how it even happened. First let me explain that there is this girl, Kristen Guilder. She is 15, the former youth pastor/now music minister's daughter. She is stuck up, arrogant, rude, self centered and every unpleasant thing you can think of. Im really not exagerating, which is sad.
Moving on.
She didnt go with us because she was supposedly "grounded" so okay we all leave. Then about 10 minutes into the meal she calls michael's phone yelling about not being invited, yadda yadda, litteral yelling. He tells her that until he can hear her through the screams, he will talk to her later and hangs up. She repeditivly calls and they keep hanging up on her. I had no knowledge of this because I was at the other table the whole time with Josh and Kristy. Then suddenly Scott gets a call and its Mrs. Beverly, she demands to speak to me, Even scott tells her I had nothing to do with this. Then she yells at me for not answering my phone, and goes on about how she's tired of me "treating her daughter like this" and I dont even know what she said but she went on yelling at me. I got mad and was like listen lady, "your daughter is disrespectful, she caused problems and was loud and rude to people sitting near us last week and we dont think she should come out with us until she learns her manners and how to behave" I said it nicely and then the "nice christian woman" turns into a mean horrid evil bitch and calls me all these things and says im a "witch" and blah blah. I dont cry often but the music ministers wife calling you names really hurts. So I hung up on her and turn to josh and start crying and then josh blows up and calls her and just it was a mess. I really am not looking forward to putting up with this crap wed. Oh goody. You know, I really hope they leave. The less hypocracy/bitchocracy in the church the better. Urg, pardon my language but im just mad. I get blamed for freakin everything weather I do it or not.
Balls (non litteral) Both my blessing and my curse.
Some people say they wish they had the courage and balls I have, but then again they dont see this side of them. Heh that sounded funny.

Ha I got booked last night. I went down there yesturday to sign some papers and decided I might as well do it while I was down there. I had so much fun. Pat was so funny, and then the goof balls down in booking were as humored as I was with this whole situation. I was smiling the whole time and cutting up with them. I wanted to have a big grin in my mug shot but the second i relaxed, the took the picture. Shucks. The fingerprint machine was like a big game, and everyone was real nice. I wasnt in the least intimidated. Except by one of the drunk guys in a holding tank, he kept staring out the window at me... creeepy...

Had a good Valentines day, Josh took me to see 50 First Dates, and to dinner. He got me a bunch of candy for Valentines day. He's trying to make me fatter, I swear. Um.
Yeah. Everyone go see 50 first dates, its so great.

Jake Andrews called me. Im in complete and total shock. I didnt think he would. Weird.

Well Im off to go dye malowee's hair and spend some quality bonding time with her. Josh wanted to do stuff, but he has done stuff with me this whole week and I need to do stuff with my dear malorie, So I told him I had plans. He acctually didnt get too pouty which is good. I just hope hes not gonna go out with like Abe or something... Josh is easily influenced by other males. Yes indeed. Well Im off to go get ready. And I STILL havnt dyed my hair. Im getting agrivated by my laziness.
Maybe Tonight.

Dad sent this to me, its really cute.


What a wonderful way to explain Heaven.
 A sick man turned to his doctor, as he was preparing to leave the examination room and said, "Doctor, I am afraid to die.
Tell me what lies on the other side."
Very quietly, the doctor said, "I don't know."
"You don't know?  You, a Christian man, do not know what is on the other side?"
The doctor was holding the handle of the door; on the other side of which came a sound of scratching and whining, and as he opened the door, a dog sprang into the room and leaped on him with an eager show of gladness.
Turning to the patient, the doctor said, "Did you notice my dog?  He's never been in this room before.  He didn't know what was inside.
He knew nothing except that his master was here, and when the door opened, he sprang in without fear.  I know little of what is on the other side of death, but I do know one thing...
I know my Master is there and that is enough."

This test only has one question but it's a very important one.

Please don't answer it without giving it some serious thought.

By giving an honest answer you will discover where you stand morally.

The test features an unlikely, completely fictional situation in which you will have to make a decision. Remember that your answer needs to be honest,yet spontaneous.

Please scroll down slowly and consider each line.

Thoughtfulness is important for this evaluation to be meaningful.

Ready? Begin . . . .
You are in Florida . . .in Miami to be exact . . .
There is chaos all around you caused by a hurricane with severe flooding.
This is a flood of biblical proportions.
You are a photojournalist working for a major newspaper and you're caught in the middle of this great disaster.The situation is nearly hopeless.You're trying to shoot career making photos.

There are houses and people swirling around you, some disappearing under the water.Nature is showing all of it's destructive fury.You see a woman in the water. She is fighting for her life, trying not to be taken away with the debris.

You move closer . . . somehow the woman looks familiar.

Suddenly you know who it is . . . it's Hillary Clinton!
At the same time you notice that the raging waters are about to take her under, forever.

You have two options: You can save her or you can take the most dramatic photos of your life. So, you can save the life of Hillary Clinton, or you can shoot a Pulitzer Prize winning photo, documenting the death of one of the world's most powerful women.

Here's the question and please give an honest answer:

Would you select color film or would you rather go with the classic simplicity of black and white?

*crosses fingers*
Please be a good day today...

I acctually went to bed at 11:30.Im proud of myself. I woke up at like 10 somethin, So not too bad. Maybe I will acctually get my sleep pattern back.

Church tonight. I need to call Kendalyn and see if she is still going tonight.

Need to go to walmart, we are running out of food, plus I need some glade plug ins, I can smell a dead mouse in the wall. Eek. Also need to talk to the walmart guys for a job. I need a job curse it all to h-e double hockey sticks.

I made cookies with good edible frosting, I feel so ACCOMPLISHED.

Its freakin funny when avril lavigne has a wig styled after that crazy do (not) of hers.

http://www.wigsunlimited.com/item486952.ctlg

So Becky, Sarah Marler, and Tasha have started calling Josh again. What are the odds honestly, just when I start to feel like we're going places and he's starting to make headway, Girls start calling.
Maybe I should follow my instinct and just stay away.

Today was good I guess, although it flew by because I slept the large majority of the day. I got up around 11 and went to Lebanon and hung out with Kristy. I got that dress before mentioned, plus some other goodies. GoodWill rocks my socks.  Anyway, Yeah ate chinese then I came home. I still have alot to do. Im sorta still tired and in a pissy mood. Everything has gotten on my nerves today. Oi, and I still didnt get to go to walmart to talk to them about a job cause I fell asleep.
I will go tomorrow if it kills me. ARG!!!

I wish someone would come over, Im lonely and bored.

*Yawn* Ow, my head.
Lack of sleep headache. Fun.


Went to GoodWill in Lebanon today, and Finally found an ugly dress for banquet. I will have to post pictures if dad will let me use his camera. Its poofy and purple and just dandy. I dunno what im going to wear with it for shoes, etc. I'll figure that out later. I also bought a pair of red pumps.
Curse my shoe obsession.
Well im off to nap kiddies.

Dangit, why cant I get back into a regular sleep pattern. I sleep all day and stay up all night. Its 2:10am and Im still wide awake. Arg. I just need to force myself to go to bed. Im determined to get up tomorrow at a decent hour before 10 and try to get back on track. I also havnt done any pilates in days and I feel like im getting slouchy. Ick. I just need to get out and get a job.

Regina- If you read this anytime soon-
Im mailing Dustin Marcellino! I gave him your phone number!
*chuckle* Im gonna see if he calls one of us, so that way we can see if he's still hot or not. Im giggling like a child. How pathetic.

Josh is coming over in the morning. Hard to believe we've known each other for 2 years exactly today. Seems like just yesturday he was slamming on his breaks to get my head to smack back into the windshield. Ah the blissful memories.

All you girlies out there go to 
www.forever21.com
Best stuff ever, better prices than cursed delias. 
Sorry, had to share my recent discovery.

I orderd stuff from old navy. This is a first time experience for me. I usual wont go near the place, much less the website, but my crazy aunt  sent me a gift card. I was surprised to find some good buys all from the privacy of my own home so I wouldnt have to beat all those happy preppy sales people off with a stick. Yay for internet shopping and sale pants.

Im getting somewhat agrivated with my parents. They've always been supportive and great but the second i really need their help, they disown me. I just suggested to them that I would like to go talk to a lawyer about this whole thing and they thought I was going to jail or something. Dad even told me bluntly if I went to jail, he wouldnt bail me out. Man, even kristy's freakin spazmatic excuse for a mother is helping her, yet my parents, the ones everyone likes and the reason everyone comes to my house, disown me. The poor pennyless excuse for a criminal daughter. Apparently im on the same scale as a murderer or theif in their books even though I did nothing but commit a misdemeanor of "Prank calling" Damn our sad excuse of a legal system.

I do believe I might just go insane. I've been so stressed out about my parents My face looks like a giant polka dot factory. I hate stress, my face will be just fine until I get this way, then wham. Plus my sleeping habbits have gone hay wire, I go to bed at around 2am and sleep till 2-3 pm. I do nothing but mope around aimlessly. Im usually not like this, but without the support of my parents I've discovered I feel alone and misserable. I cant even see Kristy till both our trials are over. Its just plain depressing.

Job hunting is going horrid as usual, Im hoping monday I can go harrass some more managers, The usual places, Goodwill, Goody's, Walmart, The restraunts by walmart then maybe blockbuster. I havnt tried that yet. I might as well. God, please help me find a job before I pull my hair out. Im so tired of being at home. It was okay when I had school work to do but now that im done, eek... pogo is probably tired of my frequent visits.

Well off to go mope around like a little ninny. Perhaps read some more of 'The Red Tent' which im reading again because it was so wonderful. Goodnite dearies.

TWO TOUGH QUESTIONS


Question 1:

If you knew a woman who was pregnant, who had 8
kids already, three who were deaf, two who were blind,
one mentally retarded, and she had syphilis,
Would you recommend that she have an abortion?


Read the next question before looking at the answer for this one.


Question 2:

It is time to elect a new world leader, and only
your vote counts. Here are the facts about the three leading candidates.


Candidate A -

Associates with crooked politicians, and consults with
astrologists. He's had two Mistresses. He also chain
smokes and drinks 8 to 10 martinis a day.

Candidate B -

He was kicked out of office twice, sleeps until noon, used opium in college and drinks a quart of whiskey every evening.

Candidate C -

He is a decorated war hero. He's a vegetarian, doesn't smoke, drinks an occasional beer and never cheated on his wife.

Which of these candidates would be your choice?



Decide first, no peeking, then scroll down for the answer.





Candidate A is Franklin D. Roosevelt.



Candidate B is Winston Churchill.



Candidate C is Adolph Hitler.








And, by the way, the answer to the abortion question:



If you said yes, you just killed Beethoven, it's his mother.


Pretty interesting isn't it? Makes a person think
before judging someone. Never be afraid to try something new.


Remember:

Amateurs built the ark. Professionals built the Titanic.


Can you imagine working for a company that has a little more than 500 employees and has the following statistics:


* 29 have been accused of spousal abuse

* 7 have been arrested for fraud

* 19 have been accused of writing bad checks

* 117 have directly or indirectly bankrupted at least 2 businesses

* 3 have done time for assault

* 71 cannot get a credit card due to bad credit

* 14 have been arrested on drug-related charges!

* 8 have been arrested for shoplifting

* 21 are currently defendants in lawsuits

* 84 have been arrested for drunk driving in the last year



Can you guess which organization this is?



Give up yet?



It's the 535 members of the United States Congress. The
same group of idiots that crank out hundreds of new
laws each year designed to keep the rest of us in line.

Well Kristy and I are screwed. We have to go to court soon, Im going to have to get mug shots and fingerprinted and everything. This should be funny. Im laughing even though Im probably going to have to pay the sherrif's dept lots of money in court fees. Heh...

Went to the Car show again today, It was even better the second time. I loved it. I especially like the new VW SUV, Its called a Tarogue or something. Its fully loaded. Good price too, Dad's looking into them maybe for some day in the future when he's got some extra retirement money lying around.
They showed the new concept car for Ford's new Mustang. I really liked the design. They've made it look more like the old body styling with new flare. Its got a powerful engine in it too. I dont think they start production till Sept.  I also got to see this new VW V12, (12 cylinder) they have out. Quite a nice looking car, the price goes upward to 80,000 dollars fully loaded and 73,000 for a normal one. Thats enough to buy a house. or 2 1/2 corvets. Yikes.
Enjoyed the quality time with dad, it was fun getting to do something we both enjoy together since we both like cars and trucks.
If anyone else wants to go the show is running through tomorrow, its at the N'vill convention center. Admission is 7 bucks, 5 bucks to park. Its well worth it.
